greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ways writing n-th prime as a sum of two primes.
comment: a(n) = 1 if and only if n is in A006512. - _Robert Israel_, Apr 04 2018
link: Muniru A Asiru, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..3000
mathematica: Table[Sum[(PrimePi[Prime[n] - i] - PrimePi[Prime[n] - i - 1]) (PrimePi[i] - PrimePi[i - 1]), {i, Floor[Prime[n]/2]}], {n, 100}] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Apr 04 2018 *)
program: (GAP) P:=Filtered([1..1000],IsPrime);; a:=List(List(List(P, i -> Partitions(i,2)), k -> Filtered(k, i -> IsPrime(i[1]) and IsPrime(i[2]))),Length); # _Muniru A Asiru_, Apr 05 2018
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Jul 05 2001
ext: Offset changed to 1 by _David A. Corneth_, Apr 04 2018
